notes.usage: Copy this file to ravenclaw_scheduled.json and add your emails
notes.important: DO NOT delete this file - it's a template
notes.note: Use /schedule API endpoint to add emails programmatically

examples.subject: Leave Request - Example
examples.body:
Dear Name,

I would like to request leave from DATE to DATE.

Reason: Your reason here.

Kind Regards,
Your Name

examples.subject: Meeting Request
examples.body:
Hi,

I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss TOPIC.

Available times:
- Option 1: DATE TIME
- Option 2: DATE TIME

Best regards

tips.timezone: Use ISO-8601 format with timezone offset or UTC
tips.future_only: target_time must be in the future
tips.priority: high priority emails are retried more aggressively
